p: Paraplegic, DPN dogs with surgically treated TL‐IVDE were recruited, blood samples were banked at presentation, and on days 1‐3, 14, 28 and 56. Outcome was established at 6 months. Serum levels of GFAP, S100β and pNF‐H were measured with ELISA tests. The association between outcome and serum levels was examined using regression tree and ROC curve analysis.
